titleStmt.title: A satyr, occasioned by the author's survey of a scandalous pamphlet intituled, The king's cabanet opened.
titleStmt.author: Lluelyn, Martin, 1616-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the university,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Martin Lluelyn by Wing.
Device on t.p. appears to be a variant of Mck. 179 or 378, without initials.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
